faqs.q: How many calories in 1 pound of ground beef?
faqs.a: About 1153 kcal for raw 80% lean ground beef.

faqs.q: Is this for raw or cooked ground beef?
faqs.a: Raw weight; cooking drains fat, reducing calories per original pound to ~950 kcal.

faqs.q: How much protein in 1 pound of ground beef?
What affects calories in ground beef most?
faqs.a: Lean-to-fat ratio; 80/20 has more calories than 90/10 or 95/5.
